001
002package io.vrap.rmf.base.client;
003
004import static io.vrap.rmf.base.client.utils.ClientUtils.blockingWait;
005
006import java.io.UnsupportedEncodingException;
007import java.net.URLEncoder;
008import java.nio.charset.StandardCharsets;
009import java.time.Duration;
010import java.util.ArrayList;
011import java.util.List;
012import java.util.Map;
013import java.util.concurrent.CompletableFuture;
014import java.util.stream.Collectors;
015
016import javax.annotation.Nullable;
017
018import com.fasterxml.jackson.core.type.TypeReference;
019import com.fasterxml.jackson.databind.JavaType;
020
021import org.apache.commons.lang3.builder.EqualsBuilder;
022import org.apache.commons.lang3.builder.HashCodeBuilder;
023
024public abstract class ApiMethod<T extends ApiMethod<T, TResult>, TResult> extends Base
025        implements RequestCommand<TResult>, ClientRequestCommand<TResult> {
026
027    public static class ParamEntry<K, V> extends Base implements Map.Entry<K, V> {
028        protected final K key;
029        protected V value;
030
031        public ParamEntry(final K key) {
032            this.key = key;
033        }
034
035        public ParamEntry(final K key, final V value) {
036            this.key = key;
037            this.value = value;
038        }
039
040        @Override
041        public K getKey() {
042            return key;
043        }
044
045        @Override
046        public V getValue() {
047            return value;
048        }
049
050        @Override
051        public V setValue(final V value) {
052            V oldValue = this.value;
053            this.value = value;
054            return oldValue;
055        }
056
057        public String toUriString() {
058            try {
059                return key + "=" + URLEncoder.encode(value.toString(), StandardCharsets.UTF_8.toString());
060            }
061            catch (UnsupportedEncodingException e) {
062                throw new EncodingException(e);
063            }
064        }
065
066        @Override
067        public boolean equals(Object o) {
068            if (this == o)
069                return true;
070
071            if (o == null || getClass() != o.getClass())
072                return false;
073
074            ParamEntry<?, ?> that = (ParamEntry<?, ?>) o;
075
076            return new EqualsBuilder().append(key, that.key).append(value, that.value).isEquals();
077        }
078
079        @Override
080        public int hashCode() {
081            return new HashCodeBuilder(17, 37).append(key).append(value).toHashCode();
082        }
083    }
084
085    private ApiHttpHeaders headers = new ApiHttpHeaders();
086    private List<ParamEntry<String, String>> queryParams = new ArrayList<>();
087    private final ApiHttpClient apiHttpClient;
088
089    protected ApiHttpClient apiHttpClient() {
090        return apiHttpClient;
091    }
092
093    public ApiMethod(final ApiHttpClient apiHttpClient) {
094        this.apiHttpClient = apiHttpClient;
095    }
096
097    public ApiMethod(final ApiHttpClient apiHttpClient, ApiHttpHeaders headers,
098            List<ParamEntry<String, String>> queryParams) {
099        this.apiHttpClient = apiHttpClient;
100        this.headers = headers;
101        this.queryParams = new ArrayList<>(queryParams);
102    }
103
104    public ApiMethod(final ApiMethod<T, TResult> apiMethod) {
105        this.apiHttpClient = apiMethod.apiHttpClient;
106        this.headers = new ApiHttpHeaders(apiMethod.headers);
107        this.queryParams = new ArrayList<>(apiMethod.queryParams);
108    }
109
110    /**
111     * adds an additional header with the specified value
112     * @param key header name
113     * @param value header value
114     * @return T
115     */
116    public T addHeader(final String key, final String value) {
117        T c = copy();
118        ((ApiMethod<T, TResult>) c).headers = ((ApiMethod<T, TResult>) c).headers.addHeader(key, value);
119        return c;
120    }
121
122    /**
123     * removes the specified header
124     * @param key header name
125     * @return T
126     */
127    public T withoutHeader(final String key) {
128        T c = copy();
129        ((ApiMethod<T, TResult>) c).headers = ((ApiMethod<T, TResult>) c).headers.withoutHeader(key);
130        return c;
131    }
132
133    /**
134     * set the header with the specified value
135     * @param key header name
136     * @param value header value
137     * @return T
138     */
139    public T withHeader(final String key, final String value) {
140        T c = copy();
141        ((ApiMethod<T, TResult>) c).headers = ((ApiMethod<T, TResult>) c).headers.withHeader(key, value);
142        return c;
143    }
144
145    /**
146     * set the headers
147     * @param headers
148     * @return
149     */
150    public T withHeaders(final ApiHttpHeaders headers) {
151        T c = copy();
152        ((ApiMethod<T, TResult>) c).headers = ((ApiMethod<T, TResult>) c).headers = headers;
153        return c;
154    }
155
156    /**
157     * set specific content type
158     * @param contentType
159     * @return
160     */
161    public T contentType(final String contentType) {
162        T c = copy();
163        ((ApiMethod<T, TResult>) c).headers = ((ApiMethod<T, TResult>) c).headers
164                .withHeader(ApiHttpHeaders.CONTENT_TYPE, contentType);
165
166        return c;
167    }
168
169    public ApiHttpHeaders getHeaders() {
170        return this.headers;
171    }
172
173    /**
174     * add an additional query parameter
175     * @param key query parameter name
176     * @param value query parameter value
177     * @param <V> value type
178     * @return T
179     */
180    public <V> T addQueryParam(final String key, final V value) {
181        T c = copy();
182        ((ApiMethod<T, TResult>) c).queryParams.add(new ParamEntry<>(key, value.toString()));
183        return c;
184    }
185
186    /**
187     * set the query parameter with the specified value
188     * @param key query parameter name
189     * @param value query parameter value
190     * @param <V> value type
191     * @return T
192     */
193    public <V> T withQueryParam(final String key, final V value) {
194        return withoutQueryParam(key).addQueryParam(key, value);
195    }
196
197    /**
198     * removes the specified query parameter
199     * @param key query parameter name
200     * @return T
201     */
202    public T withoutQueryParam(final String key) {
203        T c = copy();
204        ((ApiMethod<T, TResult>) c).queryParams = ((ApiMethod<T, TResult>) c).queryParams.stream()
205                .filter(e -> !e.getKey().equalsIgnoreCase(key))
206                .collect(Collectors.toList());
207        return c;
208    }
209
210    /**
211     * set the query parameters
212     * @param queryParams list of query parameters
213     * @return T
214     */
215    public T withQueryParams(final List<ParamEntry<String, String>> queryParams) {
216        T c = copy();
217        ((ApiMethod<T, TResult>) c).queryParams = queryParams;
218        return c;
219    }
220
221    /**
222     * add the query parameters
223     * @param queryParams list of query parameters
224     * @return T
225     */
226    public T addQueryParams(final List<ParamEntry<String, String>> queryParams) {
227        T c = copy();
228
229        ((ApiMethod<T, TResult>) c).queryParams.addAll(queryParams);
230        return c;
231    }
232
233    public List<ParamEntry<String, String>> getQueryParams() {
234        return new ArrayList<>(this.queryParams);
235    }
236
237    public List<String> getQueryParam(final String key) {
238        return this.queryParams.stream().filter(e -> e.key.equals(key)).map(e -> e.value).collect(Collectors.toList());
239    }
240
241    public List<String> getQueryParamUriStrings() {
242        return this.queryParams.stream().map(ParamEntry::toUriString).collect(Collectors.toList());
243    }
244
245    public String getQueryParamUriString() {
246        return this.queryParams.stream().map(ParamEntry::toUriString).collect(Collectors.joining("&"));
247    }
248
249    @Nullable
250    public String getFirstQueryParam(final String key) {
251        return this.queryParams.stream()
252                .filter(e -> e.getKey().equals(key))
253                .map(Map.Entry::getValue)
254                .findFirst()
255                .orElse(null);
256    }
257
258    protected abstract T copy();
259
260    public abstract ApiHttpRequest createHttpRequest();
261
262    public CompletableFuture<ApiHttpResponse<TResult>> execute() {
263        return execute(apiHttpClient());
264    }
265
266    public abstract CompletableFuture<ApiHttpResponse<TResult>> execute(final ApiHttpClient client);
267
268    public <TReturn> CompletableFuture<ApiHttpResponse<TReturn>> execute(final Class<TReturn> returnType) {
269        return execute(apiHttpClient(), returnType);
270    }
271
272    public <TReturn> CompletableFuture<ApiHttpResponse<TReturn>> execute(final ApiHttpClient client,
273            final Class<TReturn> returnType) {
274        return client.execute(this.createHttpRequest(), returnType).toCompletableFuture();
275    }
276
277    public <TReturn> CompletableFuture<ApiHttpResponse<TReturn>> execute(
278            final TypeReference<TReturn> returnTypeReference) {
279        return execute(apiHttpClient(), returnTypeReference);
280    }
281
282    public <TReturn> CompletableFuture<ApiHttpResponse<TReturn>> execute(final ApiHttpClient client,
283            final TypeReference<TReturn> returnTypeReference) {
284        return client.execute(this.createHttpRequest(), returnTypeReference).toCompletableFuture();
285    }
286
287    public <TReturn> CompletableFuture<ApiHttpResponse<TReturn>> execute(final JavaType returnJavaType) {
288        return execute(apiHttpClient(), returnJavaType);
289    }
290
291    public <TReturn> CompletableFuture<ApiHttpResponse<TReturn>> execute(final ApiHttpClient client,
292            final JavaType returnJavaType) {
293        return client.execute(this.createHttpRequest(), returnJavaType);
294    }
295
296    public ApiHttpResponse<TResult> executeBlocking() {
297        return executeBlocking(apiHttpClient(), Duration.ofSeconds(120));
298    };
299
300    public ApiHttpResponse<TResult> executeBlocking(final ApiHttpClient client) {
301        return executeBlocking(client, Duration.ofSeconds(120));
302    };
303
304    public ApiHttpResponse<TResult> executeBlocking(final Duration timeout) {
305        return executeBlocking(apiHttpClient(), timeout);
306    }
307
308    public abstract ApiHttpResponse<TResult> executeBlocking(final ApiHttpClient client, final Duration timeout);
309
310    public <TReturn> ApiHttpResponse<TReturn> executeBlocking(final Class<TReturn> clazz) {
311        return executeBlocking(apiHttpClient(), Duration.ofSeconds(120), clazz);
312    };
313
314    public <TReturn> ApiHttpResponse<TReturn> executeBlocking(final ApiHttpClient client, final Class<TReturn> clazz) {
315        return executeBlocking(client, Duration.ofSeconds(120), clazz);
316    };
317
318    public <TReturn> ApiHttpResponse<TReturn> executeBlocking(final Duration timeout, final Class<TReturn> clazz) {
319        return executeBlocking(apiHttpClient(), timeout, clazz);
320    }
321
322    public <TReturn> ApiHttpResponse<TReturn> executeBlocking(final ApiHttpClient client, final Duration timeout,
323            final Class<TReturn> clazz) {
324        final ApiHttpRequest request = this.createHttpRequest();
325        return blockingWait(client.execute(request, clazz).toCompletableFuture(), request, timeout);
326    }
327
328    public <TReturn> ApiHttpResponse<TReturn> executeBlocking(final TypeReference<TReturn> typeReference) {
329        return executeBlocking(apiHttpClient(), Duration.ofSeconds(120), typeReference);
330    };
331
332    public <TReturn> ApiHttpResponse<TReturn> executeBlocking(final ApiHttpClient client,
333            final TypeReference<TReturn> typeReference) {
334        return executeBlocking(client, Duration.ofSeconds(120), typeReference);
335    };
336
337    public <TReturn> ApiHttpResponse<TReturn> executeBlocking(final Duration timeout,
338            final TypeReference<TReturn> typeReference) {
339        return executeBlocking(apiHttpClient(), timeout, typeReference);
340    }
341
342    public <TReturn> ApiHttpResponse<TReturn> executeBlocking(final ApiHttpClient client, final Duration timeout,
343            TypeReference<TReturn> typeReference) {
344        final ApiHttpRequest request = this.createHttpRequest();
345        return blockingWait(client.execute(request, typeReference).toCompletableFuture(), request, timeout);
346    }
347
348    public <TReturn> ApiHttpResponse<TReturn> executeBlocking(final JavaType javaType) {
349        return executeBlocking(apiHttpClient(), Duration.ofSeconds(120), javaType);
350    }
351
352    public <TReturn> ApiHttpResponse<TReturn> executeBlocking(final ApiHttpClient client, final JavaType javaType) {
353        return executeBlocking(client, Duration.ofSeconds(120), javaType);
354    }
355
356    public <TReturn> ApiHttpResponse<TReturn> executeBlocking(final Duration timeout, final JavaType javaType) {
357        return executeBlocking(apiHttpClient(), timeout, javaType);
358    }
359
360    public <TReturn> ApiHttpResponse<TReturn> executeBlocking(final ApiHttpClient client, final Duration timeout,
361            JavaType javaType) {
362        final ApiHttpRequest request = this.createHttpRequest();
363        return blockingWait(client.execute(request, javaType), request, timeout);
364    }
365
366    public CompletableFuture<ApiHttpResponse<byte[]>> send() {
367        return apiHttpClient.execute(createHttpRequest());
368    }
369
370    public ApiHttpResponse<byte[]> sendBlocking() {
371        return sendBlocking(Duration.ofSeconds(120));
372    };
373
374    public ApiHttpResponse<byte[]> sendBlocking(final Duration timeout) {
375        return blockingWait(send(), timeout);
376    }
377}
